data.oai_dc:dc: Values of LT50 of frost-damaged pine needles

LT50 of frost-damage was calculated based on the relative electrolyte leakage (REL) of pine needles, derived from conductivity measurements from a common garden experiment. The LT50 was calculated with a non-linear regression using the freezing temperature as independent variable.
Central Alps|Cold hardiness|Common garden|Mediterranean|Pinus sylvestris|Pinus nigra|Pinus halepensis|Range shift
